definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: A satisfactory theory to explain EQL, however, has been elusive and is still not agreed upon.
sentences.chinese: 然而目前還沒有公認的解釋地震光的理論。

sentences.english: Hyperbaric oxygen exposure is probably the most accepted model of oxidative lung injury.
sentences.chinese: 高壓氧倉被公認爲氧化肺損傷的重要模式。

sentences.english: The press established him as the leading contender.
sentences.chinese: 報紙公認他是主要競爭者。

sentences.english: COSCO is today perceived as a model company in China as well as in the world shipping community.
sentences.chinese: 中遠在中國和世界航運界已被公認爲是公司的典範。

sentences.english: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune must be in want of a wife.
sentences.chinese: 有錢的隻身總要娶位太太，這是全球公認的真理。

sentences.english: There is not one explanation for the cause or origin of addiction.
sentences.chinese: 對於成癮症的成因或起源，並沒有公認的解釋。

sentences.english: The dream imperial sacrifices are the recognition "the Chinese first imperial sacrifices Italy female painter".
sentences.chinese: 夢禪是公認的“中國第一禪意女畫家”。

sentences.english: It is well-known that we are difficult to buy something cheap and good in Copenhagen.
sentences.chinese: 在哥本哈根想要買到便宜好貨被公認是件難事。

sentences.english: Italy originated MANOUKIAN ink, the best heat transfer stamping ink universally admitted, is adopted to the products of heat transfer stamping by SPAKCT.
sentences.chinese: 思帕客熱轉印商品採用國際上公認最好的熱轉印墨水。

sentences.english: The analgesic effects of acupuncture are well-documented.
sentences.chinese: 鍼灸止痛的效果是舉世公認的。

sentences.english: ABSTACT:MATLAB language is the internationally recognized one of the outstanding mathematical application software.
sentences.chinese: 是國際公認的優秀數學應用軟件之一。

sentences.english: Post-processor bug fix for escaped XML code that it does not recognize.
sentences.chinese: 對於不被公認的轉義XML的後處理中的缺陷修正。

sentences.english: For these reasons, the black mamba is widely considered the world’s deadliest snake.
sentences.chinese: 因此，黑曼巴被公認爲世界上最致命的蛇。

sentences.english: His poems have generally been accepted as History of poetry since the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 自唐以來，他的詩就被公認爲“詩史”。

sentences.english: Hong Kong is considered as one of the most energic districts of development in Asia, even all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 香港被公認爲亞州乃至全球最具發展活力的地區之一。

sentences.english: These universities online offer financial aid and accredited degrees as well.
sentences.chinese: 這些在線大學同樣提供助學金和公認的學歷。

definition: to view as/to see as/to consider to be/to deem
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
called/to call sth (by a name)/to name
first choice/premium/to come first in the imperial examinations
